articles.description: Developer Epic Games has announced that, following two weeks of fundraising efforts, it has managed to raise $144 million through Fortnite to support humanitarian efforts in Ukraine.
articles.content:
The fundraising effort has ended after two weeks
In two weeks, Fortnite has raised a total of $144 million for Ukraine relief efforts. Ahead of its most recent season, developer Epic Games said that… [+1058 chars]
